Reviews.Title: Not Happy
Reviews.Author: CharmedOne
Reviews.Content: While certainly NOT the seller's fault, I was very disappointed in this phone. I never bothered to set it up. It is MUCH smaller than anticipated, or rather, stated by Sprint. It's very limited in it's capabilities. Again, not the seller's fault, but mine for not doing deeper research prior to purchase.

Reviews.Title: Great Condition
Reviews.Author: DANIELA MERCADO
Reviews.Content: Like new! No scratches and was still in original box! This cell was in perfect condition at a great price!
